channel.title: C# strings

item.title: C# strings
item.dc:creator: @dino1001 dino1001
item.description:
@dino1001 wrote:

EDIT:

fixed

    public string readString()
    {
        int i = currentOffset;
        while(buffer[currentOffset++] != 10) ;
        char[] chars = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetChars(buffer);
        return new String(chars, i, currentOffset - i - 1);
    }
